ALL: How can I check my ip address in ub: ipconfig or ifconfig ?
but it is giving NAT ip
I want to check my PPP ip address
if you're looking for your external IP address and are behind a router that does NAT, ifconfig will only give you the internal IP.  You'll need to use a site like ipchicken.com to find your external
there has to be some command to know that
it's impossible for your computer to find out it's external IP if it's behind a NAT device
The process HAS to use some external computer
what are you trying to accomplish exactly?
chances are your ISP's DHCP server will give you the same address
Yeah but it does also give facility to its users to renew it
You should be able to find it on the web interface to your router/modem
Rebooting your router/modem may do the trick in renewing your IP

the ONLY way you're going to find out your IP is from your router/modem's interface, or using a website like whatismyip.org
